urls.title: JBA Bentley supports EA to hit target of improving flood protection to 300,000 homes
urls.description: The Environment Agency has announced the fantastic news that 300,000 homes and properties have been better protected from the effects of climate change as a result of the government‚Äôs ¬£2.6billion investment over the last six years. The full press release can be read on the Environment Agency (EA) website. We at JBA Bentley are immensely proud of our role in supporting the EA in achieving this target. We have delivered projects that have contributed significantly to milestone, including improving

text:
We are immensely proud of our role in supporting 
@EnvAgency in achieving their target of protecting 300,000 homes and properties from the effects of climate change over the last six years üåäü§ù

Read more over on our newly-revamped website üëâ https://t.co/EjofPmZvVt 

#WeAreJBAB https://t.co/utJNJgT9Qk
